projects.detail: A React-based personal website to showcase projects and skills.
A dashboard to demonstrate complex state management using Redux.
A simple blog platform built using Next.js with server-side rendering.
An e-commerce store built with React and integrated payment gateway.
A task manager app leveraging Redux for efficient state management.
A Next.js-based portfolio website with server-side rendering and dynamic routing.
A social media dashboard to monitor platform metrics built with React.
A shopping cart application built with Redux for state management.
A CMS built with Next.js featuring dynamic content management.
A weather forecasting app built with React and OpenWeather API.
A financial expense tracker app using Redux for managing state.
A news aggregator built using Next.js with server-side data fetching.
A recipe finder app built using React and an external API.
A real-time chat application with Redux for managing messages and user state.
A job portal built with Next.js and integrated with an external jobs API.
A task scheduling app built with React and drag-and-drop functionality.
A product inventory management system using Redux for state management.
An event management app built with Next.js featuring server-side rendering.
A fitness tracking app built with React and external fitness API integration.
A blog management system using Redux for handling post states and user data.
